page.description: Returns TRUE if the record pointer is at the beginning of the file.
page.discussion: BOF() returns .T. (TRUE) if the record pointer is at the first record of the current table; otherwise, it returns .F. (FALSE).
page.example: bof() -> TRUE if the record pointer is at the first record of the current table. bof() -> FALSE if the record pointer is not at the first record of the current table.
